info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Saratoga, southern Washington and northwestern Rensselaer Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mechanicville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mechanicville, Cambridge, Greenwich, Lee, Easton, Stillwater, Schuylerville, Victory, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, Schaghticoke Hill, Center White Creek, Center Falls, Johnsonville, Willow Glen, Coons, Wayville, Middle Falls, North Cambridge and Clarks Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
